alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:13PM CST until December 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations up to a quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...West Otter Tail, East Otter Tail, Wadena and Grant Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and difficult road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Otter Tail
